title: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0', the dataset returns an incorrect result set or just returns a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the dataset with 'row[0] equals to '
EB: The dataset should return the expected result based on the given filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a filter in the dataset with 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected behavior:
- The first result record returned when previewing correctly reflects the filter expression set.
- As per the developer, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched, so it should not be taken as a valid filter expression.
